name: Iris (CalArts GameMakers)
description:
You find yourself in a bleak, strange area, seemingly habited. You are given an automated message about your mission, you are a Debug Bot. Your mission is to restore a simple robot that is displayed on your monitor.

CREDITS:

Isa Hanssen - Moderator/BG Artist

Gavin Morrison- Programmer

Kanoa Ichiyanagi - Concept artist/Character artist

Zack Ross - Musician

Evan Johnson- Musician

Noah Lemelson - Writer

Kai Tucker- Voice Actor

PRODUCERS:

Vincent De La Torre, Marley Townsend, Roy Berardo, Theo Vaillant

You can listen to the soundtrack from this game and other CalArts Game Makers titles here!
